00039 /*! Storage for the header in a CDF file. */
00040 class FusionCDFFileHeader
00041 {
00042 protected:
00043         /*! The GCOS CDF file header object. */
00044         affxcdf::CCDFFileHeader *gcosHeader;
00045 
00046         /*! The Calvin CDF file object. */
00047         affymetrix_calvin_io::CDFData *calvinData;
00048 
00049         /*! The reference sequence */
00050         std::string ref;
00051 
00052         /*! Initializes the class based on GCOS information.
00053          * @param data The GCOS CDF file object.
00054          */
00055         void Initialize(affxcdf::CCDFFileData *data);
00056 
00057         /*! Initializes the class based on Calvin information.
00058          * @param data The Calvin CDF file object.
00059          */
00060         void Initialize(affymetrix_calvin_io::CDFData *data);
00061 
00062         /*! Friend to the parent. */
00063         friend class FusionCDFData;
00064 
00065 public:
00066         /*! Get CDF Format Version
00067          * @return CDF Format Version
00068          */
00069         int GetFormatVersion() const;
00070 
00071         /*! Get GUID
00072          * @return GUID
00073          */
00074         std::string GetGUID() const;
00075 
00076         /*! Get integrity md5
00077          * @return integrity md5
00078          */
00079         std::string GetIntegrityMd5() const;
00080 
00081         /*! Gets the number of feature columns in the array.
00082          * @return The number of columns.
00083          */
00084         int GetCols() const;
00085 
00086         /*! Gets the number of feature rows in the array.
00087          * @return The number of rows.
00088          */
00089         int GetRows() const;
00090 
00091         /*! Gets the number of probe sets.
00092          * @return The number of probe sets.
00093          */
00094         int GetNumProbeSets() const;
00095 
00096         /*! Gets the number of QC probe sets.
00097          * @return The number of columns.
00098          */
00099         int GetNumQCProbeSets() const;
00100 
00101         /*! Gets the reference sequence (for resequencing arrays only).
00102          * @return The reference sequence.
00103          */
00104         std::string &GetReference();
00105 
00106         /*! Constructor */
00107         FusionCDFFileHeader();
00108 };

00110 /*! This class provides storage for an individual probe in a CDF file */
00111 class FusionCDFProbeInformation
00112 {
00113 private:
00114         /*! The GCOS probe object. */
00115         affxcdf::CCDFProbeInformation *gcosProbe;
00116 
00117         /*! The Calvin probe object. */
00118         affymetrix_calvin_io::CDFProbeInformation *calvinProbe;
00119 
00120         /*! Initializes the class for GCOS file reading.
00121          * @param index The index to the probe.
00122          * @param gcosGroup The GCOS probe group object.
00123          */
00124         void Initialize(int index, affxcdf::CCDFProbeGroupInformation *gcosGroup);
00125 
00126         /*! Initializes the class for Calvin file reading.
00127          * @param index The index to the probe.
00128          * @param calvinGroup The Calvin probe group object.
00129          */
00130         void Initialize(int index, affymetrix_calvin_io::CDFProbeGroupInformation *calvinGroup);
00131 
00132         /*! Deallocates any used memory. */
00133         void Clear();
00134 
00135         /*! Friend to the parent class. */
00136         friend class FusionCDFProbeGroupInformation;
00137 
00138 public:
00139         /*! Returns the list index.
00140          * @return The list index.
00141          */
00142         int GetListIndex() const;
00143 
00144         /*! Returns the expos value.
00145          * @return The expos value.
00146          */
00147         int GetExpos() const;
00148 
00149         /*! Returns the X coordinate.
00150          * @return The X coordinate.
00151          */
00152         int GetX() const;
00153 
00154         /*! Returns the Y coordinate.
00155          * @return The Y coordinate.
00156          */
00157         int GetY() const;
00158 
00159         /*! Returns the probes base at the interrogation position.
00160          * @return The probes base at the interrogation position.
00161          */
00162         char GetPBase() const;
00163 
00164         /*! Returns the targets base at the interrogation position.
00165          * @return The targets base at the interrogation position.
00166          */
00167         char GetTBase() const;
00168 
00169         /*! Returns the probe length.
00170          * @return The probe length.
00171          */
00172         unsigned short GetProbeLength() const;
00173 
00174         /*! Returns the probe grouping.
00175          * @return The probe grouping.
00176          */
00177         unsigned short GetProbeGrouping() const;
00178 
00179         /*! Constructor */
00180         FusionCDFProbeInformation();
00181 
00182         /*! Destructor */
00183         ~FusionCDFProbeInformation();
00184 };

00271          * @param cell_index Index to the probe of interest.
00272          * @param info The returned probe data.
00273          */

00360 /*! This class provides storage for QC probes */
00361 class FusionCDFQCProbeInformation
00362 {
00363 private:
00364         /*! The GCOS probe object. */
00365         affxcdf::CCDFQCProbeInformation *gcosProbe;
00366 
00367         /*! The Calvin probe object. */
00368         affymetrix_calvin_io::CDFQCProbeInformation *calvinProbe;
00369 
00370         /*! Initializes the class for GCOS file reading.
00371          * @param index The index to the probe.
00372          * @param gcosSet The GCOS QC probe set.
00373          */
00374         void Initialize(int index, affxcdf::CCDFQCProbeSetInformation *gcosSet);
00375 
00376         /*! Initializes the class for Calvin file reading.
00377          * @param index The index to the probe.
00378          * @param calvinSet The Calvin QC probe set.
00379          */
00380         void Initialize(int index, affymetrix_calvin_io::CDFQCProbeSetInformation *calvinSet);
00381 
00382         /*! Deallocates any used memory. */
00383         void Clear();
00384 
00385         /*! Friend to the parent class. */
00386         friend class FusionCDFQCProbeSetInformation;
00387 
00388 public:
00389         /*! Constructor */
00390         FusionCDFQCProbeInformation();
00391 
00392         /*! Destructor */
00393         ~FusionCDFQCProbeInformation();
00394 
00395         /*! Gets the X cooridnate of the probe.
00396          * @return The X coordinate.
00397          */
00398         int GetX() const;
00399 
00400         /*! Gets the Y cooridnate of the probe.
00401          * @return The Y coordinate.
00402          */
00403         int GetY() const;
00404 
00405         /*! Gets the probe length.
00406          * @return The probe length. This value may be 1 for non-synthesized features.
00407          */
00408         int GetPLen() const;
00409 
00410         /*! Gets the flag indicating if the probe is a perfect match probe.
00411          * @return The flag indicating if the probe is a perfect match probe
00412          */
00413         bool IsPerfectMatchProbe() const;
00414 
00415         /*! Gets a flag indicating if the probe is used for background calculations (blank feature).
00416          * @return Flag indicating if the probe is used for background calculations (blank feature).
00417          */
00418         bool IsBackgroundProbe() const;
00419 };

00485 /*! This defines the combined GCOS/Calvin CDF data interaction class. */
00486 class FusionCDFData  
00487 {
00488 protected:
00489         /*! The GCOS CDF file object. */
00490         affxcdf::CCDFFileData *gcosData;
00491 
00492         /*! The header object. */
00493         FusionCDFFileHeader header;
00494 
00495         /*! The Calvin CDF file object. */
00496         affymetrix_calvin_io::CDFData *calvinData;
00497 
00498         /*! The name of the file to read. */
00499         std::string fileName;
00500 
00501         /*! Creates either the GCOS or Calvin parser object. */
00502         void CreateObject();
00503 
00504 public:
00505         /*! Constructor */
00506         FusionCDFData();
00507 
00508         /*! Destructor */
00509         ~FusionCDFData();
00510 
00511         /*! Sets the name of the file.
00512          * @param name The full path of the CDF file.
00513          */
00514         void SetFileName(const char *name);
00515 
00516         /*! Gets the name of the file.
00517          * @return The full path of the CDF file.
00518          */
00519         std::string GetFileName() const;
00520 
00521         /*! Gets the header object.
00522          * @return The CDF file header object.
00523          */
00524         FusionCDFFileHeader &GetHeader();
00525 
00526         /*! Get GUID
00527          * @return GUID
00528          */
00529         std::string GetGUID();
00530 
00531         /*! Get integrity md5
00532          * @return integrity md5
00533          */
00534         std::string GetIntegrityMd5();
00535 
00536         /*! Gets the error string.
00537          * @return A string describing the last read error.
00538          */
00539         std::string GetError() const;
00540 
00541         /*! Gets the name of a probe set.
00542          * @param index The index to the probe set name of interest.
00543          * @return The probe set name.
00544          */
00545         std::string GetProbeSetName(int index) const;
00546 
00547         /*! Gets the chip type (probe array type) of the CDF file.
00548          * @return The chip type. This is just the name (without extension) of the CDF file.
00549          */
00550         std::string GetChipType();
00551 
00552         /*! Gets the chip types (probe array type) of the CDF file. Allow substrings deliminated by '.'
00553          * @return vector of chip types
00554          */
00555     std::vector<std::string> GetChipTypes();
00556 
00557         /*! Reads the entire file.
00558          * @return True if successful.
00559          */
00560         bool Read();
00561 
00562         /*! Reads the header of the file only.
00563          * @return True if successful.
00564          */
00565         bool ReadHeader();
00566 
00567         /*! Checks if the file exists.
00568          * @return True if the file exists.
00569          */
00570         bool Exists();
00571 
00572         /*! Deallocates memory and closes any file handles. */
00573         void Close();
00574 
00575         /*! Determines if a CDF file is of the XDA (binary) format.
00576          * @param fileName The name of the file to test.
00577          * @return True if XDA format.
00578          */
00579         static bool IsXDACompatibleFile(const char *fileName);
00580 
00581         /*! Determines if a CDF file is of the Calvin format.
00582          * @param fileName The name of the file to test.
00583          * @return True if Calvin format.
00584          */
00585         static bool IsCalvinCompatibleFile(const char *fileName);
00586 
00587         /*! Gets the probe set type for non-qc probe sets.
00588          * @param index The index to the probe set of interest.
00589          * @return The type of probe set.
00590          */
00591         affxcdf::GeneChipProbeSetType GetProbeSetType(int index) const;
00592 
00593         /*! Gets the probe set information.
00594          * @param index The index to the probe set of interest.
00595          * @param info The probe set information.
00596          * @return The probe set information.
00597          */
00598         void GetProbeSetInformation(int index, FusionCDFProbeSetInformation & info);
00599 
00600         /*! Gets the QC probe set information by index.
00601          * @param index The index to the QC probe set of interest.
00602          * @param info The QC probe set information.
00603          * @return The QC probe set information.
00604          */
00605         void GetQCProbeSetInformation(int index, FusionCDFQCProbeSetInformation & info);
00606 
00607         /*! Gets the QC probe set information by type.
00608          * @param qcType The type of QC probe set to retrieve.
00609          * @param info The QC probe set information.
00610          * @return The QC probe set information.
00611          */
00612         void GetQCProbeSetInformation(affxcdf::GeneChipQCProbeSetType qcType, FusionCDFQCProbeSetInformation & info);
00613 };
